description: Disables HTTP logging on a Windows IIS web server as seen by Threat Group 3390 (Bronze Union)
author: frack113
name: Disable Windows IIS HTTP Logging
query: (((process.executable.text:*\\appcmd.exe) OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"appcmd.exe")) AND (process.command_line.text:*set* AND process.command_line.text:*config* AND process.command_line.text:*section\:httplogging* AND process.command_line.text:*dontLog\:true*))
